title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for the Ollama API—works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive model picker and progress bars.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension backed by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation template using Ollama + Chroma in a single Docker Compose stack.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using the official ollama-js client.

title: discord-ollama
summary: Discord bot that lets servers query local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight Python client for Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built async Rust crate for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama models through admin-configurable chat endpoints.

title: ollama-github-action
summary: GitHub Action to spin up Ollama in CI for testing code against local LLMs.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot using Socket-mode to answer questions with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaPromptNode.
